<script type="text/javascript">

addLoadEvent( alignDivs );
window.onresize = alignDivs;
function alignDivs()
{
var contentarea, pricontent, seccontent, quatcontent;
var heightadjust;

contentarea = document.getElementById('content');
pricontent = document.getElementById('primary-content');
seccontent = document.getElementById('secondary-content');
quatcontent = document.getElementById('quaternary-content');

contentarea.style.height = "auto";
pricontent.style.height = "auto";
seccontent.style.height = "auto";
quatcontent.style.height = "auto";

BoxHeights.equalise('primary-content','content', 'secondary-content', 'quaternary-content');

heightadjust = parseFloat(quatcontent.style.height) - parseFloat(document.getElementById('content-header').scrollHeight);
quatcontent.style.height = heightadjust + 'px';
seccontent.style.height = heightadjust + 'px';
}
</script>

<img src="/Images/mosaic_tcm15-13527.png" align="left" alt="Mosaic" /><p>Residents and visitors can enjoy an exciting range of arts activities including theatre, film, exhibitions, dance, concerts and heritage.
